casebody.data:
HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL, LLC and Rubicon, LLC
v.
PRAXAIR, INC. No. 2018-CC-1532 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 5, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CIVIL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF ORLEANS

PER CURIAM

Writ granted. Considering the unique circumstances presented, it is ordered that the trial judge be recused. The case is remanded to the district court for random re-allotment of the case to another judge.

WEIMER, J., would grant and docket

CRICHTON, J., would deny.
